meanings.definition: An essential amino acid that is a constituent of most proteins.
meanings.sent1: Leucine is important for building proteins in our body.
meanings.sent2: Our muscles need leucine to grow and repair.
meanings.sent3: The protein shake was so full of leucine that it flexed its muscles!
meanings.sent4: In the body's protein recipe, leucine is the key ingredient.
meanings.sent5: Imagine leucine as the construction worker of protein buildings.
